content: As an AI language model, I don't hold personal beliefs, opinions, or attitudes. However, true crime movies and documentaries can create sympathy for the criminal if not presented cautiously. These productions often provide a detailed and nuanced understanding of the criminal and their motives and may lead the audience to empathize or even sympathize with the criminal. Additionally, the use of dramatic background music, cinematography, and storytelling techniques can inherently create emotional and psychological connections between the audience and the subject. Nevertheless, it is the producers' responsibility to ensure that they do not glorify or romanticize the criminal's behavior and instead provide an objective and fact-based portrayal of the crimes and their effects on victims and society.
